tool_description: An api for dinosaurs and dinosaur lovers
title: Dinosaur API

api_list.name: Dinosaurs by hip
api_list.description: returns a list of either Ornithischia hipped dinosaurs or Saurischia hipped dinosaurs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com/dinosaurs/hip/{type}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: dinosaur random facts
api_list.description: Returns a random fact about dinosaurs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com/dinosaurs/facts/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Dinosaurs by Era
api_list.description: Will return a list of dinosaurs based on their era.  You can use triassic, jurassic or cretaceous.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com/dinosaurs/era/{era}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get dinosaur
api_list.description: Will retrieve a single dinosaur based on its id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com/dinosaurs/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get dinosaurs
api_list.description: This retrieves all dinosaurs that is in the data set
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com/dinosaurs"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dinosaur-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
